originalText.text: Very professional and experienced whole staff.  I appreciate your time and efforts throughout this journey for H-1 visa. I genuinely appreciate your patience and support from beginning to end and adjusting your pace and guidance as per my means and availability. Once again, I am humbled to receive your service and support and am thankful. As a small token of gratitude, I am recommending your services to others.

originalText.text: Shankar is really thoughtful, diligent and kind f to work with. Even though they were not my primary lawyers they were the most helpful to me at the times I needed help most. Shankar - you really pulled for me and offered advice kindly when I needed it most - thank you!

originalText.text:
I had the privilege of working with Shankar and Co throughout my journey to secure my PERM Labor Certification, and I couldn't be more pleased with the outstanding service and support I received. From the very first consultation to the final approval, their team demonstrated a level of professionalism, expertise, and dedication that surpassed my expectations. I applied for an EB3 as well as an F1 and F2 visas with the firm and they have always delivered in the most amazing way possible.

The complexities of the immigration process can be daunting, but Shankar and Co made the entire experience seamless and stress-free. Here are some key highlights of my experience with them:

Expert Guidance: Shankar and Co boasts a team of highly knowledgeable and experienced staff who are well-versed in the intricacies of the PERM Labor Certification process. They provided me with invaluable insights and clear, step-by-step guidance throughout the entire procedure.

Personalized Approach: What truly sets Shankar and Co apart is their commitment to understanding each client's unique situation. They took the time to get to know me, my background, and my goals, tailoring their services to my specific needs. I never felt like just another case.

Timely and Transparent Communication: Communication was consistently prompt and transparent. They kept me informed at every stage, ensuring I was aware of the progress being made and what to expect next. This level of communication instilled confidence in me about in their process.

Attention to Detail: The PERM Labor Certification process demands meticulous attention to detail, and Shankar and Co excelled in this aspect. They ensured that every document, form, and submission was error-free and met the stringent requirements of the Department of Labor.

Advocacy and Support: Throughout the process, I always felt that Shankar and Co had my best interests at heart. They advocated for me vigorously, addressing any challenges or concerns that arose along the way.

Successful Outcome: Thanks to Shankar and Co's expertise and unwavering support, I successfully obtained my F1 and F2 visas and afterwards the PERM Labor Certification. It was a momentous achievement that opened the door to further immigration steps on my path to realizing my American dream and towards receiving my EB3

In conclusion, I cannot recommend Shankar and Co highly enough. Their dedication, expertise, and personalized service were instrumental in achieving my immigration goals. If you are navigating the complexities of the PERM Labor Certification process or any immigration matter, Shankar and Co is the firm you can trust to guide you toward success. They turned what could have been a daunting experience into a smooth and successful journey. Thank you, Shankar and Co, for helping me realize my dreams in the United States.

originalText.text: I applied for my initial H1B and I-140 Processing through this firm, they are very responsive. They have good understanding of the ask and the documents required to complete it with little to no objection. They have completed my process with out any hiccups. I would recommend them to others in case of H1B and green card process.

originalText.text:
We applied for my mother in law's green card ourselves and the application was declined. We reached out to Shankar in urgent need for help. He was very knowledgeable and reassuring, recommended the motion to reopen.

It was Swee and Vidhi on her team who actually filed the motion. They were extremely helpful in guiding through the process every step of the way on what documentation needs to be procured and in what format. We especially appreciated that they were very patient with us giving us ample time and multiple calls to answer all the questions we had.

We were super happy when the petition was approved within 2 weeks after filing, and we had received the green card a week after. I would highly recommend their services for anyone needing immigration legal services.

It was Swee and Vidhi on her team who actually filed the motion. They were extremely helpful in guiding through the process every step of the way on what documentation needs to be procured and in what format. We especially appreciated that they were very patient with us giving us ample time and multiple calls to answer all the questions we had.

We were super happy when the petition was approved within 2 weeks after filing, and we had received the green card a week after. I would highly recommend their services for anyone needing immigration legal services.
